description.line1: ShipStack lets you build production-grade SaaS apps by assembling modular blocks.
description.line2: Skip the setup. Forget boilerplate. Auth, billing, deployment‚Äîready out of the box.
description.line3: Focus on your product, we‚Äôll handle the rest.

framework.footer: ShipStack is built on the shoulders of giants

modularByDesign.title: Modular by Design
modularByDesign.description: Assemble production-grade SaaS apps from reusable building blocks. Ship faster without reinventing the wheel.

prebuiltAuth.title: Prebuilt Auth & Security
prebuiltAuth.description: OAuth, magic‚Äëlink, RBAC‚Äîall set up for you. Focus on features, not user flows.

billing.title: Subscription & Billing
billing.description: Stripe‚Äëpowered subscriptions, invoicing and tax handling‚Äîready out of the box.

deployment.title: Seamless Deployment
deployment.description: CI/CD integration with Vercel (or your platform of choice) for zero-hassle releases.

modernStack.title: Modern Tech Stack
modernStack.description: Next.js ‚Ä¢ Tailwind CSS ‚Ä¢ shadcn/ui‚Äîdeveloper-friendly defaults with best-in-class DX.

extensible.title: Customizable & Extensible
extensible.description: Override any component or hook, plug into our event bus or bring your own backend logic.

globalFirst.title: Global-First
globalFirst.description: Built-in i18n with next-intl, locale-aware routing and a language switcher included.

docsSdk.title: Comprehensive Docs & SDKs
docsSdk.description: In-depth guides, code samples and SDKs to get you started in minutes.

description.starter: Essential tools to get you started.
description.growth: Everything in Starter, plus tools to grow faster.
description.enterprise: Everything in Growth, plus enterprise-grade support and scale.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Whether you're just getting started or scaling fast, we're here to support you every step of the way. Here are some common questions to help you get started with ShipStack.

items.question: What makes ShipStack different from other SaaS starters?
items.answer: ShipStack is not just a template ‚Äî it‚Äôs a production-ready SaaS system built with modular blocks, instant deployment, and prebuilt auth, billing, and more.

items.question: Can I use ShipStack for commercial projects?
items.answer: Absolutely. ShipStack is designed to help you launch real-world SaaS apps quickly and reliably.

items.question: Is it possible to customize modules?
items.answer: Yes. Every block in ShipStack is fully extensible and built for developer customization.

items.question: How is authentication handled?
items.answer: We use secure, prebuilt authentication flows with industry best practices out of the box.

items.question: Does ShipStack support multi-language apps?
items.answer: Yes, i18n is built-in using next-intl, ready to localize your SaaS app globally.

items.question: Is there documentation or support?
items.answer: Yes, you‚Äôll find comprehensive docs, code examples, and community support to help you build faster.

footer.description: Managing a small business today is already tough. ShipStack makes building SaaS easier.
